text: aqmRutaq(gm)q hira#NyaM prAqNEShu# hiraNyaSaqlkAn pratya#syati pratiqShThAmEqvaina#d-gamayiqtvA prAqNaiH sama#d^^rdhayati daqddhnA ma#dhumiqSrENa# pUrayati madhaqvyO#&sAqnIti# SRutAtaq~gkyE#na mEddhyaqtvAya# grAqmyaM ~MvA EqtadannaqM ~Myad-daddhyA#raqNyaM madhuq yaddaqddhnA ma#dhumiqSrENa# pUqraya#tyuqBayaqsyA-va#ruddhyai paSuSIqrq.ShANyupa# dadhAti paqSavOq vai pa#SuSIqrq.ShANi# paqSUnEqvAva# rundhEq yaM kAqmayE#tApaqSuH syAqditi# - [  ] 50
